summary: This is an Introduction Music Replacement mod that will replace the music of the main menu screen to \"Games of Thrones - Introduction\".
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This is an Introduction Music Replacement mod that will replace the music of the main menu screen to \"Games of Thrones - Introduction\".

Original YouTube Video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_KYp4nUAqEs

Installation:

You have to download it manually and put the .xwm file in the \"skyrim/data/music/special\" directory. 

If it doesn\'t exist, create it. 

Reverse the process to uninstall.
author: Ghardak
